main event: A private pilot observed a metallic, high-speed object that stopped abruptly and then traveled in a northwesterly direction near Paris, Illinois on October 9, 1951.
interesting points: The object appeared to be approximately 1/3 the size of a conventional aircraft.
The object traveled at a high rate of speed and then stopped abruptly.
The object then started to travel in a northwesterly direction at a high rate of speed.
Weather conditions were clear with no clouds or haze.
Further investigation revealed no significant facts, and it was impossible to determine if any jet aircraft were in the area due to the lapse of time since the sighting.
